original: dpral ba na snying rje byang chub kyi sems kyi zla ba cha shas bcu drug pa'i gnas yin zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: dpral ba na snying rje byang chub kyi sems kyi zla ba cha shas bcu drug pa'i gnas yin zhes bya ba'o //
translated: On the forehead is the abode of the moon of the sixteen parts of the bodhicitta of compassion.

original: 'di nyid kyi dbus su zhes pa ni dpral ba dang nor bu'i dbus su'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyi dbus su zhes pa ni dpral ba dang nor bu'i dbus su'o //
translated: In the middle of this means in the middle of the forehead and the jewel.

original: gang zhig rnam par gnas pa ni zhes pa ni /
analyzed: gang zhig rnam par gnas pa ni zhes pa ni /
translated: That which abides means

original: stong pa nyid kyis bskyed pa'i byang chub sems gang zhig rnam par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyis bskyed pa'i byang chub sems gang zhig rnam par gnas pa'o //
translated: that bodhicitta generated by emptiness abides.

original: lhan cig skyes pa'i zhes pa ni /
analyzed: lhan cig skyes pa'i zhes pa ni /
translated: Coemergent means

original: chos rnams kyis de bzhin nyid gzod ma nas gnas pa /
analyzed: chos rnams kyis de bzhin nyid gzod ma nas gnas pa /
translated: the suchness of phenomena that has existed from the beginning.

original: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon yang rung /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon yang rung /
translated: Whether the tathÄgatas of the three times come or

original: gshegs kyang rung /
analyzed: gshegs kyang rung /
translated: whether they do not come,

original: mi 'gyur ba gnas pa gang yin pa de 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi lhan cig skyes pa yin la /
analyzed: mi 'gyur ba gnas pa gang yin pa de 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi lhan cig skyes pa yin la /
translated: that unchanging abiding is the coemergent relative of the world.

original: de dag na bde ba mi 'dzag pa'i ye shes chen po 'dis rtogs shing khong du chud pa yin gyi /
analyzed: de dag na bde ba mi 'dzag pa'i ye shes chen po 'dis rtogs shing khong du chud pa yin gyi /
translated: They realize and comprehend that with this great gnosis of undissipating bliss.

original: gzhan du ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: It is not otherwise.

original: 'bras bu'i ming rgyul  btags pa yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i ming rgyul  btags pa yin no //
translated: The name of the result is figuratively designated to the cause.

original: gong du bstan pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba chen po gang yin pa de 'jig rten pa'i kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa med pas bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: gong du bstan pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba chen po gang yin pa de 'jig rten pa'i kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems 'dzag pa med pas bsgrub par bya ba yin la /
translated: That which is the innate great bliss taught above is to be accomplished by the non-emission of the mundane conventional awakening mind.

original: 'dzag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bzhi pa ste /
analyzed: 'dzag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni bzhi pa ste /
translated: That which is non-emission is the fourth,

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang zhes kyang brjod par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang zhes kyang brjod par bya ba yin no //
translated: and it should be called the supramundane initiation.

original: de nyid bum pa dang gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes kyi mthar sbyin par byas la /
analyzed: de nyid bum pa dang gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes kyi mthar sbyin par byas la /
translated: That itself is given at the end of the vase, secret, and wisdom-knowledge initiations.

analyzed: gsum pa shes rab ye shes la sogs pa la bzhi par ma gsungs kyi /
translated: The third, the wisdom-knowledge initiation, and so on, are not mentioned in the fourth.

analyzed: bzhi pa ni grangs kho na yin pa'i lung bstan par bya ba'i ched du /
translated: The fourth is only a number, and it is taught in the Tantra of the Vajra Tent of the Dakini.

original: de ni mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur zhes bya ba smos te /ğŸ”½de ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de ni mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur zhes bya ba smos te / de ni zhes bya ba ni /

original: bzhi pa de ni zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: bzhi pa de ni zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That itself is the fourth.

original: mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Dakini is the name of a class of goddesses.

original: nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'o //
translated: The concentration like space is taught.

original: rdo rje gur zhes pa ni mi phyed pa'i gnas te rdo rje'i gnas rnam par rtog pa'i dra ba thams cad bsal ba la bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gur zhes pa ni mi phyed pa'i gnas te rdo rje'i gnas rnam par rtog pa'i dra ba thams cad bsal ba la bya'o //
translated: The Vajra Tent is the abode of indivisibility, the vajra abode, which is to be understood as the removal of the net of all discursive thoughts.

analyzed: de ni he badzra'i bshad pa'i rgyud du bstan to // dang po la ni @69a * //

original: bum pa'i dbang //
analyzed: bum pa'i dbang //
translated: The first is the vase empowerment.

original: gnyis pa gsang ba zhes su brjod //
analyzed: gnyis pa gsang ba zhes su brjod //
translated: The second is called the secret.

original: shes rab ye shes gsum pa ste //
analyzed: shes rab ye shes gsum pa ste //

original: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i dbang bstan la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten pa'i dbang bstan la /

analyzed: de yang gsum pa man chad 'jig rten par nges shing /

original: de las tha dad par gyur pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang ni /
analyzed: de las tha dad par gyur pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbang ni /
translated: The supramundane empowerment, which is different from that, is

analyzed: ji bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa min // zhes gsungs so //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa'i nges pa yang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes pa'i nges pa yang /

analyzed: ji ltar byon pa de ltar gshegs pa'am //

original: ji ltar gsungs pa de ltar mdzad pa ste //
analyzed: ji ltar gsungs pa de ltar mdzad pa ste //

original: bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur //
analyzed: bden par smra zhing tshig mi 'gyur //

original: ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed //ğŸ”½ces gsungs pa yin la /
analyzed: ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed // ces gsungs pa yin la /
translated: He does what he says.ğŸ”½Here, the TathÄgata is said to be the thought of awakening.

original: skabs 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems la brjod do //
analyzed: skabs 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems la brjod do //
translated: And it is said:

analyzed: de yang ji ltar phyi rol de ltar nang // zhes gsungs pa yin la /

original: de ni gsum pa la yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni gsum pa la yod pa ma yin te /

analyzed: de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba gsum pa yin par ma gsungs so //

original: gzhan yang bzhi pa ni byang chub sems ji ltar 'ongs pa de ltar 'gro ste ;
analyzed: gzhan yang bzhi pa ni byang chub sems ji ltar 'ongs pa de ltar 'gro ste ;
translated: Moreover, the fourth stage is the going of the thought of awakening as it has come.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes gsungs so //ğŸ”½gang yang de ni /ğŸ”½ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed //
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes gsungs so // gang yang de ni / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed //

original: ces kyang bya ste /
analyzed: ces kyang bya ste /

original: bla mas lung phog pa'i dus su ji skad du //ğŸ”½khyod kyis 'dod la chags bral bar //
analyzed: bla mas lung phog pa'i dus su ji skad du // khyod kyis 'dod la chags bral bar //

analyzed: nam du yang ni mi bya'o // 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi // khams gsum na ni sdig gzhan med //

original: ces bsgo ba ni /
analyzed: ces bsgo ba ni /

original: shugs kyis dang du blangs pa yin pas /
analyzed: shugs kyis dang du blangs pa yin pas /

original: ji skad du smras pa yin no /
analyzed: ji skad du smras pa yin no /

analyzed: rjes su gsungs shing byang chub kyi sems ji ltar 'dzag pa de ltar gyen du gtong bas na de bzhin byed pa yin no //

translated: As it is said, â€œIn the third, the bliss that does not drip is certain.â€

original: de skad gsungs pa'i phyir ro //ğŸ”½de bzhin du yang zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de skad gsungs pa'i phyir ro // de bzhin du yang zhes pa ni /

analyzed: gzhan yang rgyud kyi khungs ston par byed pa'o //

original: de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na /

original: rtsa ba'i rgyud las zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: rtsa ba'i rgyud las zhes gsungs te /

original: rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba ni mchog gi dang po'i rtsa ba'i rgyud las so //

analyzed: ji skad gsungs she na / las kyi phyag rgya dag dang ni //
translated: How is it stated?ğŸ”½â€œHaving abandoned the karmamudra

original: brtags pa'i phyag rgya ye shes spangs //
analyzed: brtags pa'i phyag rgya ye shes spangs //
translated: and the gnosis of the imagined mudra,

original: mchog tu mi 'gyur sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: mchog tu mi 'gyur sbyor ba yis //
translated: through the yoga of the supreme immutable,

original: phyag rgya chen po nges bstan bya //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po nges bstan bya //
translated: The Great Seal is taught.ğŸ”½Thus it is said.

original: zhes gsungs so zhes bya ba ni las kyi phyag rgya ni 'pho ba 'khrid par byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so zhes bya ba ni las kyi phyag rgya ni 'pho ba 'khrid par byed pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: ye shes kyi phyag rgya ni kun du rtogs pa'i bdag nyid yin la kun du rtogs pa @69b yin pas de bzhin nyid la reg pa med do //

analyzed: de bas na de nyid spang bar gsungs so //

analyzed: de bas na las dang / ye shes las tha dad par gyur pa'i phyag rgya chen mo ni // mchog tu mi 'gyur sbyor ba yis //

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /

analyzed: gang yang de mi 'gyur bar byed pa ni yul la rab tu rgyug par byed pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rta rlung rab tu gzung bar bstan to //
translated: That which makes it unchanging is the holding of the horse of consciousness, which runs to the objects, very tightly.

original: rlung gang yin pa de 'dzin pa la /
analyzed: rlung gang yin pa de 'dzin pa la /
translated: That which is the wind is the holding of the

original: mi 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi 'gyur bar byed pa'i phyir ro //

original: de la gdong phyag rgya chen mo zhes bya ba rnam pa kun gyi mchog dang ldan pa'i bde ba /

analyzed: kha na mtho ba med pa /

analyzed: rmad du byung ba'i bde ba /

analyzed: gong du gsal byed nyid dang ldan par byed pa ni shes rab mtshon par byed pa'o //
translated: The one that has a consonant above indicates wisdom.

original: de bzhin du thung du thams cad ni thabs yin la /
analyzed: de bzhin du thung du thams cad ni thabs yin la /
translated: Likewise, all the short vowels are method.

original: ring po thams cad ni shes rab yin no //
analyzed: ring po thams cad ni shes rab yin no //
translated: All the long vowels are wisdom.

original: de bzhin du a'a li ni thabs k'a li ni shes rab /
analyzed: de bzhin du a'a li ni thabs k'a li ni shes rab /
translated: Likewise, Äli is method and kÄli is wisdom.

original: thig le ni thabs /
analyzed: thig le ni thabs /
translated: The bindu is method.

original: tsheg drag na shes rab /
analyzed: tsheg drag na shes rab /
translated: The visarga is wisdom.

original: ces rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las gsungs pa yin la ;
analyzed: ces rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po las gsungs pa yin la ;
translated: Thus it is taught in the Great Root Tantra.

original: gzhan du yang ci rigs par sbyar ro //
analyzed: gzhan du yang ci rigs par sbyar ro //
translated: And it is applied in other cases as well, as is appropriate.

original: rkang gnyis gtso bos dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyud chen gsungs //
analyzed: rkang gnyis gtso bos dang po'i sangs rgyas rgyud chen gsungs //
translated: The chief of men, the primordial Buddha, taught the Great Tantra.

original: gnod sbyin sde dpon gyis kyang de yi 'grel pa mdzad par gyur //
analyzed: gnod sbyin sde dpon gyis kyang de yi 'grel pa mdzad par gyur //
translated: The chief of the yakshas also composed a commentary on it.

original: thugs rje mnga' ba'i rkang gnyis gtso bos lung bstan pas //
analyzed: thugs rje mnga' ba'i rkang gnyis gtso bos lung bstan pas //
translated: The chief of men, the compassionate one, prophesied

original: de rjes 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bsdus pa'i rgyud 'di bstan //
analyzed: de rjes 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bsdus pa'i rgyud 'di bstan //
translated: that after him Manjushri would teach this Condensed Tantra.

original: 'gro rnams ngo mtshar bskyed phyir spyan ras gzigs dbang gis //
analyzed: 'gro rnams ngo mtshar bskyed phyir spyan ras gzigs dbang gis //
translated: In order to generate wonder in beings, Avalokiteshvara

original: 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang sgrol ma'i sras su 'gyur zhes bsgrags //
analyzed: 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang sgrol ma'i sras su 'gyur zhes bsgrags //
translated: proclaimed that he would be the son of Manjushri and Tara.

original: des kyang sngon gyi dam bcas bshol ba mi mnga' bas //
analyzed: des kyang sngon gyi dam bcas bshol ba mi mnga' bas //
translated: And he, not delaying the promise he had made before,

original: bsdus rgyud me tog phreng 'grel dri ma med 'di mdzad //
analyzed: bsdus rgyud me tog phreng 'grel dri ma med 'di mdzad //
translated: composed this Stainless Garland of Flower Commentary on the Condensed Tantra.ğŸ”½The virtue I have gained by composing this commentary

original: rab 'byed dbang gi 'grel pa rdo rje'i tshig / legs par 'byed byed bdag brtsams dge ba gang //
analyzed: rab 'byed dbang gi 'grel pa rdo rje'i tshig / legs par 'byed byed bdag brtsams dge ba gang //
translated: on the Vajra Lines, which so clearly elucidates the empowerment

original: chu bo'i rgyun ltar rab 'bab dge ba des //
analyzed: chu bo'i rgyun ltar rab 'bab dge ba des //
translated: And the river of virtue flows on like a stream,

original: chos 'byung dri med grong khyer mchog thob shog //
analyzed: chos 'byung dri med grong khyer mchog thob shog //
translated: May we attain the supreme city of the immaculate Dharma.

original: / dbang gi rab tu byed pa'i 'grel pa /
analyzed: / dbang gi rab tu byed pa'i 'grel pa /
translated: Commentary on the Abhisamayalankara

original: rdo rje'i tshig 'byed pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: rdo rje'i tshig 'byed pa zhes bya ba /
translated: Called the Diamond Words Divider

original: dge slong mkhas pa chen po d'a ri ka pas mdzad pa /
analyzed: dge slong mkhas pa chen po d'a ri ka pas mdzad pa /
translated: By the great scholar-monk Darika

original: bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong shes rab grags pas bla ma las mnyan nas bsgyur pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong shes rab grags pas bla ma las mnyan nas bsgyur pa rdzogs so//
translated: Translated by the Tibetan translator-monk Sherab Drakpa after hearing it from the guru.
